title: Is the IFS too biased?
body:
Title says it all, I put a post recently that I was chat banned. pretty much support stated that chat log is the easiest method for people to be punished. And people that negatively impact game play more than often are having a bad game. 

So in all respect, why is it that if a player get frustrated. and only shows argumentative behaviour, with no abuse towards others. Why does that player receive a instant penalty. however a player that just continually ints because he can't have his own way passable as 'having a bad game'

The screen shot below, please explain how I am supposed to 'play out' the game. 

https://gyazo.com/41b89175fe1ebf840841d950134745b9

I asked support previously with a screen shot from a different game, they replied with, your stats are decent, you should be able to grind if you ignore these games.  How am I supposed to ignore these sort of games when 9/10 games I play is the same thing, multiple players giving up minutes into the game because they are ganked early etc.

I feel as though other games that are 'competitive' have a better grasp on dealing with these matters.

P.s. Yes I am pissed that I received my latest chat ban. linked below

https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behaviour/lO9kzR1p-yes-chat-ban-me-again
